definition: to dodge/to duck out of the way/to beat it/shaken (by a fall)/to sprain/to pull a muscle/lightning/spark/a flash/to flash (across one's mind)/to leave behind/(Internet slang) (of a display of affection) "dazzlingly" saccharine

sentences.english: I have been asked how I felt in the Blitz.
sentences.chinese: 有人问我闪击战期间的感受。

definition: to besiege and strike the relief force (idiom); strategy of surrounding a unit to entice the enemy to reinforce, then striking the new troops

Battle of Stalingrad (1942-1943), decisive battle of Second World War and one of the bloodiest battles in history, when the Germans failed to take Stalingrad, were then trapped and destroyed by Soviet forces
pinyin: Si1 da4 lin2 ge2 le4 Zhan4 yi4

definition: Stalingrad, former name of Volvograd 伏爾加格勒|伏尔加格勒 (1925-1961)
using the few to defeat the many (idiom); to win from a position of weakness
